summary: Changes various NPCs to look more alluring. This is an ongoing product.
descriptionHtml:
Changes various female NPCs that I always liked the personalities of, making them look more alluring, beautiful (by modern media standards), seductive, and/or sultry. 

Currently Includes...

[b]Whiterun NPCs:[/b]
Adrianne Avenicci
Alfhild Battle-Born
Arcadia
Carlotta Valentia
Danica Pure-Spring
Hulda
Imperial Captain (Helgen Intro)
Irileth
Lydia
Saadia
Saffir
Ysolda

I plan on altering as many female NPCs as I possibly can. Will add more NPCs over time.

For best results, use in conjunction with...
Pretty Face Pack: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7887
Pretty Lips: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167
author: UPRC
